content.question: The confrontation illustrated in the two photographs can be seen as a specific example of the global rivalries in the period after 1945 that also directly produced which of the following?

choices.label: The NATO and Warsaw Pact military alliances
The Hutu-Tutsi ethnic tensions that led to the Rwanda genocide
Regional economic cooperation blocs, such as the EEC, ASEAN, and Mercosur

content.answer: The NATO and Warsaw Pact military alliances

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
